@graph.rdfs:comment: The class denoting a Poseidon package definition object
The class denoting the Poseidon Site Table description object
The class denoting the Poseidon Sample Table description object
The class denoting the Poseidon C14 Table description object
A foreign key into the Sites table
A foreign key into the Samples table
The class denoting an Identifier for a sample used in the museum or archaeological/anthropological collection that the sample is from.
Name of the tissue used for analysing the sample.
Uncalibrated C14 date in years before 1950 (BP)
Calbibrated C14 date median value in years before 1950 (BP)
Lower end of 2-sigma range of calbibrated C14 date in years before 1950 (BP)
Upper end of 2-sigma range of calbibrated C14 date in years before 1950 (BP)
Type of the dating. Can be C14, contextual or modern
